content: I have a relatively new phone, and I just got a new case last week, a transparent one with a slight purple tint. By the way, when I ordered the case, I considered getting a screen protector as well, but I decided against it since my phone's screen is still in good condition. Anyway, back to the battery issue, I use my phone quite frequently, especially for social media and watching videos, so I'm not sure if that's the main culprit.
